recipeInstructions.text: Pound chicken breasts if too thick. Place cheese and ham on each breast. Fold chicken over filling and secure with toothpicks. Mix the flour and paprika in a small bowl and coat the chicken pieces.

Heat the butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat and cook the chicken until browned on all sides. Add the wine and bouillon. Reduce heat to low, cover and simmer for 30 minutes until chicken is no longer pink.

Remove the toothpicks and transfer the breasts to a warm platter. Blend cornstarch with cream in a small bowl and whisk slowly into skillet. Cook, stirring until thickened, and pour over chicken. Serve warm.
